annotations.description: In This video we dive into a few recipes which can be found in our good friend Dave Stolte's book Home Bar Basics And Not So Basics. The book fits each recip...
annotations.title: Slings, Sours, Grogs and Nogs

textContent:
1.5oz (45ml) Mezcal
.75oz (22.5ml) Creme de Cacao
.25oz (7.5ml) Ancho Reyes
1oz (30ml) Heavy Cream
Orange Twist and Discard
Grated Nutmeg Garnish

Shake and strain into coupe
